actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for permanent tax rate reductions for individuals.
short_title: Individual Income Tax Rates Reduction Act

summary.text: Individual Income Tax Rates Reduction Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce individual and estate and trust income tax rates in 1979 and 1980 and to establish a permanent reduction in such rates for 1981 and succeeding years.

titles.title: Individual Income Tax Rates Reduction Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for permanent tax rate reductions for individuals.
